body:
I don't know what kind of issue this is, it's not the same as the other one but I've done some things to try and solve it but it doesnt work.
So basically what happens is that every time I try and go in fullscreen mode in minecraft it crashes.

Message:
The game crashed whilst updating screen events
Error: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Keyboard must be created before you can read events

Thanks

-Sam
